edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class PostScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.PostScene

  • public class PostScene
extends java.lang.Object
    PostScene provides a way to display text and images after a level is won/lost, before gameplay resumes. A PostScene can include arbitrary text and pictures.

    • Method Summary

      • addExtraWinText

        public static void addExtraWinText(java.lang.String text,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int red,
                   int green,
                   int blue,
                   java.lang.String fontName,
                   int size)
        Draw text on the PostScene that shows when the level is won
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display
        x - The X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - The Y coordinate of the bottom left corner
        red - The red component of the color (0-255)
        green - The green component of the color (0-255)
        blue - The blue component of the color (0-255)
        fontName - The name of the font to use
        size - The font size to use
